publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-191 Jackie Baillie: Living Below The Radar—That the Parliament agrees that it is unacceptable that 90,000 children in Scotland are living in severe poverty, as identified in new research published by Save the Children, and calls on the Scottish Executive to commit to eradicating child poverty by 2020, target resources and invest in an action plan that prioritises the needs of the poorest children by supporting parents into and remaining in work, maximising benefit uptake and working in partnership with the UK Government to end child poverty. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-191 Living Below The Radar (lodged on 18 June 2007) Iain Gray*, Bill Butler*, Sarah Boyack*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Liam McArthur*, Hugh O’Donnell*, James Kelly*, Christine Grahame*, Marlyn Glen*, Pauline McNeill*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Margaret Smith*, Karen Gillon*, George Foulkes*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Cathie Craigie*, Ken Macintosh*, John Lamont*, Patricia Ferguson*, Robin Harper*, Trish Godman*
S3M-191 Living Below The Radar (lodged on 18 June 2007) Alison McInnes*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Mary Mulligan*, Claire Baker*, Sandra White*, Kenneth Gibson*, Cathy Peattie*
S3M-191 Living Below The Radar (lodged on 18 June 2007) Elaine Smith*

S3M-191 Jackie Baillie: Living Below The Radar—That the Parliament agrees that it is unacceptable that 90,000 children in Scotland are living in severe poverty, as identified in new research published by Save the Children, and calls on the Scottish Executive to commit to eradicating child poverty by 2020, target resources and invest in an action plan that prioritises the needs of the poorest children by supporting parents into and remaining in work, maximising benefit uptake and working in partnership with the UK Government to end child poverty. Supported by: Iain Gray, Bill Butler, Sarah Boyack, Malcolm Chisholm, Liam McArthur, Hugh O’Donnell, James Kelly, Christine Grahame, Marlyn Glen, Pauline McNeill, Marilyn Livingstone, Margaret Smith, Karen Gillon, George Foulkes, Ms Wendy Alexander, Mr Frank McAveety, Cathie Craigie, Ken Macintosh, John Lamont, Patricia Ferguson, Robin Harper, Trish Godman, Alison McInnes, Mr Jamie Stone, Mary Mulligan, Claire Baker, Sandra White, Kenneth Gibson, Cathy Peattie, Elaine Smith
S3M-191 Living Below The Radar (lodged on 18 June 2007) Robert Brown*, Michael McMahon*
S3M-191 Living Below The Radar (lodged on 18 June 2007) Jack McConnell*
S3M-191 Living Below The Radar (lodged on 18 June 2007) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-191 Living Below The Radar (lodged on 18 June 2007) Mike Pringle*
S3M-191 Living Below The Radar (lodged on 18 June 2007) Hugh Henry*
S3M-191 Living Below The Radar (lodged on 18 June 2007) Bob Doris* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
